content.html:
As WWDC approaches, I‚Äôm once again reminded of all the apps I‚Äôve started and abandoned.

It‚Äôs so easy to be inspired by something new and click create new project. It‚Äôs exciting and you start to think of how you could use this in an app. You create more projects for different apps, and suddenly you‚Äôve stopped working on it.

What will it be this year?

content.html:
Craig Abbott has written one of the best posts about web accessibility I‚Äôve read in a long time.

Lets be clear, WCAG 2.1 AA is a binary standard. You either pass all of the required criteria, or you don‚Äôt.

Partially supported is not supported
